How to report ELECTRICTY issues in Joburg

To make sure our city services work well, it's important to report issues like potholes, power cuts, water leaks, or fallen trees. Following up and taking more steps if needed can help fix these issues. Hereï¿½s how you can report these issues in Joburg.

Please read point 4 for reporting issues with ELECTRICTY.

Steps for reporting issues

  1. Go to the Joburg eservices website to log a fault:
  • City of Joburg e-services
  1. Call the Joburg Call Centre:
  • Phone: 0860 56 28 74
  • Email: joburgconnect@joburg.org.za
  1. Register on Log Now Smart City:
  • Sign up at Log Now to report city problems and see FAQs.
  1. Report ELECTRICTY issues:
Category What You Can Report Department Contact Details
Electricity Power outage City Power Johannesburg
Phone number: 011 490 7484
Toll free number: 0800 003 156 (06h00-18h00)
Website: citypower.mobi
Meter reading City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Illegal connections City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Equipment damage/exposure City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Faulty streetlights City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Installation of streetlights and high mast lights City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Broken overhead cable City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Vandalized or unsecured distribution box City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Explosion of substation or transformer City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Cable explosion City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Faulty meter City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Power phase issues City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Prepaid meter City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above
Wires/cables City Power Johannesburg Contact details same as above

Source: City of Joburg
